mapper.select: SELECT userCode,userName,TO_CHAR(hiDay,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS hiDay FROM testTable
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO testTable ( userCode, userName, hiDay ) VALUES ( #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, SYSDATE
)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM testTable WHERE userCode = #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sche_seq, mst_seq, user_id, start_dt, end_dt, title, contents, place, reg_id, reg_dt, upd_id, upd_dt, sche_type FROM tb_intra_sche
